snippet.title: Warhammer Online Production Video Podcast #6- Making of
snippet.description: In this month's Production Podcast, we follow the process of creating the Chaos Chosen from concept to finished in-game model. You are with us every step of the way as we reveal the messy secrets behind the initial brainstorming sessions and discuss the intricacies of modeling and texturing. Plus, witness never-before-seen footage of our first Chaos RvR tests.
